TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IWithBackendHttpConfiguration`1<ParentT>

Docs.summary: The stage of an application gateway request routing rule definition allowing to specify the backend HTTP settings configuration to associate the routing rule with.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Microsoft.Azure.Management.Network.Fluent.ApplicationGatewayRequestRoutingRule.UpdateDefinition.IWithBackendOrAddress`1<!ParentT> ToBackendHttpConfiguration(string name) cil managed

Docs.param: The name of a backend HTTP settings configuration.
Docs.summary: Associates the specified backend HTTP settings configuration with this request routing rule. If the backend configuration does not exist yet, it must be defined in the optional part of the application gateway definition, using {.
Docs.code: DefineBackendHttpConfiguration(...)}. The request routing rule references it only by name.
Docs.return: The next stage of the definition.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Microsoft.Azure.Management.Network.Fluent.ApplicationGatewayRequestRoutingRule.UpdateDefinition.IWithBackendOrAddress`1<!ParentT> ToBackendHttpPort(int32 portNumber) cil managed

Docs.param: The port number for a new backend HTTP settings configuration.
Docs.summary: Creates a backend HTTP settings configuration for the specified backend port and the HTTP protocol, and associates it with this request routing rule. An auto-generated name will be used for this newly created configuration.
Docs.return: The next stage of the definition.
